description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

克里斯汀·贝尔（Kristen Bell，1980年7月18日－），美国女演员，原名克里斯滕·安妮·贝尔（Kristen Anne Bell），她拥有波兰与苏格兰的血统。麦斯达演出美国热门电视剧《美眉校探》中的角色Veronica Mars而为人熟悉。在《美眉校探》停播之后，她在2007年又加入了今秋CW主打的由小说改编而成的美国热门青春偶像剧《绯闻女孩》（《Gossip Girl》，也有译为《八卦天后》的）中为终极大博士生Gossip Girl 配音，受到广泛好评，之后又参与了《冰雪奇缘》安妮公主的配音工作。

Do You Want to Build a Snowman?
-Kristen Bell&Agatha LeeMonn&Katie Lopez

Do you want to build a snowman?
Come on let’s go and play!
I never see you anymore,
come out the door,
it’s like you’ve gone away
We used to be best buddies
and now we’re not, I wish you would tell me why
Do you want to build a snowman?
It doesn’t have to be a snowman
Okay, bye

Do you want to build a snowman?
Or ride our bike around the halls?
I think some company is overdue,
I started talking to, the pictures on the walls
Hang in there, Joan!
It gets a little lonely, all these empty rooms,
just watching the hours tick by…

Please I know you’re in there,
people are asking where you’ve been
They say ‘have courage,
and I’m trying to,
I’m right out here for you, just let me in
We only have each other,
it’s just you and me, what are we gonna do?
Do you want to build a snowman?

模唱：

讲解：

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Do you want to build a snowman

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Aromatic
Aromatic means to have a delicious smell. What is aromatic? How is it aromatic? Where is the smell found?
This week's topic: They took in the aromatic surrounding... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) aromatic bakery of freshed baked goods
2) walking by an aromatic flower shop
3) aromatic spa therapy
4) aromatic potpourri decorating a room
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

Two cups of aromatic coffee were served promptly. After the staff who brought in the coffee left the room and closed the door, the two people continued their discussion regarding the renovation. The club manager described what ideas he had in mind while the interior designer jotted down notes. Every so often, the designer would sum up his understanding of the manager's creative vision, ensuring they were both on the same page in terms of what should be changed and what should be left untouched, as well as the overall atmosphere.

想要得到专业主持人的点评和意见吗？快来节目现场一试身手吧>>
